div.p: Honorable and godly learned, honorable sir, I offer you my willing service. Your recent letter from the 18th of this month has reached me well. Since then, I have not written to you, but have awaited letters from Anger and Lyon. I was pleased to hear that you received my letter along with the fine questions from our adversaries, who should rightfully be ashamed, as you report, that the course of the holy gospel is being hindered...
